title: Council Decision of 23 January 1995 appointing a member and an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 23 January 1995 appointing a member and an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training (95/C 57/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 75/364/EEC of 16 June 1975 setting up an Advisory Committee on Medical Training (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas, by its Decision of 25 July 1994 (2), the Council appointed Dr Seamus HEALY a member and Dr Cillian TWOMEY an alternate member for the period ending 24 July 1997;
Whereas the Irish Government has nominated Dr Cillian TWOMEY to replace Dr Seamus HEALY and Dr Cormac MACNAMARA to replace Dr Cillian TWOMEY,
main_body: Dr Cillian TWOMEY is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training in place of Dr Seamus HEALY for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 24 July 1997.

Dr Cormac MACNAMARA is hereby appointed an alternate member of the Advisory Committee on Medical Training in place of Dr Cillian TWOMEY for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which ends on 24 July 1997.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 January 1995.
For the Council
The President
A. JUPPĂ
(1) OJ No L 167, 30. 6. 1975, p. 17.
(2) OJ No C 221, 9. 8. 1994, p. 1.
